TITLE: Business Environment and Outlook
TITLE: Angola Announced final investment decision for gas development projects at the Quiluma and Maboqueiro (Q&M) fields.
TITLE: Canada Invested in Aurora Hydrogen, a company developing emission-free hydrogen production technology.
TITLE: Egypt Made a significant gas discovery at the Nargis block offshore Egypt in the eastern Mediterranean Sea.
TITLE: Israel Approved a project to expand the company’s Tamar gas field in offshore Israel.

ITEM 7:
TITLE: Namibia Entered Namibia by acquiring an 80 percent working interest in a deepwater oil and gas exploration lease.
TITLE: Nigeria Extended Agbami and Usan leases to 2042.
TITLE: Republic of Congo Extended the Haute Mer production sharing contract to 2040.
TITLE: United States Completed the sale of the company’s interest in the Eagle Ford Shale in Texas.
TITLE: United States Acquired REG, becoming the second largest producer of bio-based diesel in the United States.
TITLE: United States Awarded 34 exploration leases in the Gulf of Mexico.
TITLE: United States Announced joint venture with Baseload Capital to develop geothermal projects.
TITLE: United States Announced collaboration with Raven SR Inc. and Hyzon Motors to produce hydrogen from green waste.
